mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (MID, PSID, PQUANTITY) VALUES (#{mId}, #{pSId}, #{pQuantity})
mapper.select: SELECT ps.PSID, pc2.PNAME, pci.PIMG, pc1.PCPRICE, pci.COLORNAME, ps.PSIZE, c.PQUANTITY, (SELECT BNAME FROM BRAND WHERE BNO = pc2.BNO) AS BNAME, CASE WHEN ps.PSSTOCK = 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS "PSTATUS", CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM LIKES l WHERE l.MID = c.MID AND pc1.PID = l.PID) THEN 'icon_btn_on' ELSE '' END AS "LIKE" FROM PRODUCT_STOCK ps, PRODUCT_COLOR_INFO pci, PRODUCT_COLOR pc1, PRODUCT_COMMON pc2, CART c WHERE pc1.PID = pc2.PID AND ps.PCID = pc1.PCID AND pc1.PCID = pci.PCID AND ps.PSID = c.PSID AND c.MID = #{mId} ORDER BY c.PSID DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE CART SET PQUANTITY = #{pQuantity} WHERE PSID = #{pSId} AND MID = #{mId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CART WHERE MID = #{mId} AND PSID = #{pSId}
